channel.title: The Chopped & Screwed Experiments©
channel.description:
Bio
Mr. Carolina is a local independent Hip Hop artist based out of High Point, NC, but he has achieved an international presence with his unique style of mixing that incorporates different styles of djing such as chopping & screwing and . Having an affinity for music at a young age Mr. Carolina became fascinated with music at age 12. Early influences include RUN DMC, Jimmy Hendrix, Prince, Bob Marley, Parliament and Funkadelike and any other tapes his parents had collected over the years. As he grew older, his interest expanded into broad genres of music such as Techno, Drum and Bass, House, Grime, and Bail Funk. Mr. Carolina received his first set of turntables in 2005; allowing him to relentlessly pursued the perfection of his craft. After spending a year studying the styles and technique of such greats as Jam Master J, Grand Master Flash, Dj Jazzy Jeff, and Dj Qbert, Mr. Carolina began to develop his style focusing on scratching and blending records. Through years of practice, Mr. Carolina has been referred to as “a mix master” and has started his own podcast The Chopped & Screwed Experiments that is listened to all over the world. Currently the site boast an audience of more than 4000 downloads a month, and is available through I Tunes. Mr. Carolina is constantly improving every aspect of his musical ability.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Experimenting with ur perception
channel.itunes:author: DJ Mr.Carolina
channel.itunes:summary:
Bio
Mr. Carolina is a local independent Hip Hop artist based out of High Point, NC, but he has achieved an international presence with his unique style of mixing that incorporates different styles of djing such as chopping & screwing and . Having an affinity for music at a young age Mr. Carolina became fascinated with music at age 12. Early influences include RUN DMC, Jimmy Hendrix, Prince, Bob Marley, Parliament and Funkadelike and any other tapes his parents had collected over the years. As he grew older, his interest expanded into broad genres of music such as Techno, Drum and Bass, House, Grime, and Bail Funk. Mr. Carolina received his first set of turntables in 2005; allowing him to relentlessly pursued the perfection of his craft. After spending a year studying the styles and technique of such greats as Jam Master J, Grand Master Flash, Dj Jazzy Jeff, and Dj Qbert, Mr. Carolina began to develop his style focusing on scratching and blending records. Through years of practice, Mr. Carolina has been referred to as “a mix master” and has started his own podcast The Chopped & Screwed Experiments that is listened to all over the world. Currently the site boast an audience of more than 4000 downloads a month, and is available through I Tunes. Mr. Carolina is constantly improving every aspect of his musical ability.

item.title: Adele - Set Fire To The Rain ( Dj Mr. Carolina Remix )
item.description:
What Up World

I had to do this mix when i heard this remix to one of global sensation Adele's song set fire to the rain. I havent heard to many of her songs but i like what i hear. This mix is high energy and is perfect for that ride to work playlist that everyone needs to have. As always you can reach me  by email djmrcarolina.com or by twitter @Dj_MrCarolina or @FirstNFlight

 


TrackListings:

Adele x DJ Irresistible - Set fire to the rain (CLUB REMIX)

Rude Kid feat. Skepta - Get Busy (Jamie Grind Remix)

item.title: Driicky Graham - Snap Backs and Tats (Dj Mr. Carolina Mash Up)
item.description:
What up world its been an interesting past few weeks i just fin my second yr in college (yay me) Mc A Died R.I.P and Apple kicked my show out of iTunes :/ hopefully this will put less of a strain on my show and i wont have my show offline for so long but anyway hopefully it wont affect the show two much but anyway here is a crazy mash up i did it should have your speakers banging out for at least a few days

Enjoy

 

Tracklistings:

Trolley Snatcha - Make My Whole World

Driicky Graham - Snap Backs and Tats

Kirko Bangs - Drink in My Cup

Nicki Minaj - Beez in The Trap

item.title: Kendrick Lamar Ft. Dr Dre - The Recipe (Dj Mr. Carolina Remix)
item.description:
Whats Goood World MR. Carolina here with my Nigga Old Younging AKA Rico Phantom posted in the studio Bumping this mix as i type. Dr Dre hasnt put out a song or verse that i have liked so much in a min so i had to remix and he teamed up with Kendrick Lamar one of the hardest rappers coming out of the west coast. Instant Classic in my ears. and of course LMFAO has been putting out club bangers for a min and the driving baseline the groups newest smash hit Sexy And I Know It was just the thing that push this mix right over the edge. This mix is a true banger for your Ipods.

Enjoy

 

TrackListing:

LMFAO - Sexy And I Know It

Kendrick Lamar - The Recipe

item.title: ASAP Rocky - Peso (Dj Mr. Carolina Remix)
item.description:
ASAP Rocky is one of the best upcoming artist of 2012 and his single Paso had me hypnotized the first time i heard it. I havent heard too much of his music but i like this one tho. im gonna have to listen more of his music but from what i heard so far i like. Stay tuned for more remixes coming soon and Check Out My New Mixtape Dreams For Retail on DatPif.com http://www.datpiff.com/Mr-Carolina-Dreams-For-Retail-mixtape.323997.html

 

 

Tracklisting:

ASAP Rocky - Peso

? - That Heat
item.dc:creator: DJ Mr.Carolina

item.title: Wale - Lotus Flower Bomb (All The Light Dubstep Remix)
item.description:
What up World Mr. Carolina Back wit this new mix and a new mixtape. Dreams For Retail is out now check it out Here http://www.datpiff.com/Mr-Carolina-Dreams-For-Retail-mixtape.323997.html  Ive been working on it for a min let me know what yall think. This mix is from Wale's new album Ambition. I just added a lil wobble too it to give it that extra ugh that you can feel in your speakers. More mixes comming soon so be on the look out.

 

TrackListings:

Kanye West - All The Lights (Dubstep Remix)

Wale - Lotus Flower Bomb

item.title: Mr. Carolina - V day Mix
item.description:
Happy V Day Everyone hope you got someone special to spend the day with. This mix is more so for the female part of my audience more so than anyone else but i feel like every1 should enjoy it. Just remember to be thankful for all your loved ones even if u dont have a significant other trust me your not alone. Even though i love all women i dont have one in particular but its cool all you lovely ladies can send your Vday wishes to me through twitter @Dj_MrCarolina lol. Enjoy the time you have with your boyfriend/girlfriend/boo/whatever.

 

 

TrackListing:

Amerie - One Thing

Beyonce - Crazy in Love

Nicki Minaj - Bought the Bar

Nicki Minaj - Massive Attack (ins)

Drake - Fancy

Rihanna - Rude Boy

J. Cole - In The Morning

Chris Brown - Paper Scissors Rock

Beyonce - Countdown

Beyonce - Party

item.title: DJ Mr. Carolina - ATL MiX (Atlanta Breaks)
item.description:
WHAT UP ATL My Homeboy just turned 21 so me and him are bout to go see whats poppin in Atlanta. Im Too Pumped for this trip right now!! So i decided to make a mix to commemorate the occasion. O and i gota say HAPPY BDAY to my boy Boon we bout to do it big!

 

Tracklist:

Erick B & Rakim - Lyrics of Fury

Travis Porter - Bring it Back

Tyga ft Young Jeezy - Rack City ReMix

Juvenile - Back That Azz Up

Yin Yang Twins - Salt Saker

Lil Jon - Get Low

item.title: Dj Mr. Carolina - O My Hoodness Mix
item.description:
Hello World Dj Mr. Carolina here wit another trunk banger. So idk if you have heard about SOPA or not but i suggest you educate yourselfs with it cause it could mean that this is my last posting EVER and the end of the internet as we know it. If this bill is passed i will no longer be able to continue the show so if you oppose censorship of the internet sign this petition http://bit.ly/wMqkuN 

We Can Make A Difference


 

 

 

TrackListing:

Gucci Mane - Lost it

Future - Same Time

Rick Ross - King of Dimonds

Futer - Gone to the Moon

Rick Ross - New Bugatti

Gucci Mane Ft. Future - Lamborghini

Young Jeezy - Bandana on the Choppa

Rick Ross Ft. Wale, 2Chains - Fuck Em

item.title: Mr. Carolina - Come And Go (DubStep ReMix)
item.description:
Happy New Year! Whats good ppl Mr. Carolina here to start your new yr off right with a lil bit of my own personal flava. Some of yall might remember this track i made a few months ago called come and go well his is an electric remix that is sure to hav your arm hair standing up. I just want to say thank you to all the ppl out there that listen to my show its all about you guys MUCH LOVE. Hope every1 has a good yr and keep Downloding.

 

Tracklisting:

Mr. Carolina - Come & Go (Prd. by Lex Luger)

Sware?! - Baby Doll VIP

item.title: Dj Mr. Carolina - Thanksgiving Day Breaks 2 (Chikns 4 Thanksgiving)
item.description:
HAPPY TURKEY DAY

What up People Hope everything is well with ya'll as for me life is crazy as usual but i had to make time to put this together for my hommie C.L.Watty he asked if i was gona put out anothet thanksgiving day breaks so here it is. Of course we all know that this is the 2nd installment of thanksgiving day breaks if you havent heard the first one go check it out on my website www.mrcarolin.podomatic.com

This yr i wanted to take ya'll to the hood a lil with a lil bit of trap music thrown in the mix.

Make sure to check out my man Chad Pack Mixtape: Birthday Boy

http://www.datpiff.com/Chad-Pack-Birthday-Boy-mixtape.286418.html

& Rod Ciz's newest mixtape TCOR

http://www.datpiff.com/Rod-Ciz-The-Chronicles-Of-Roderick-mixtape.243966.html

& My newest mixtape YMCMB ReMix:

http://www.datpiff.com/Lil-Wayne-YMCMB-Remix-mixtape.282278.html

 

Last but not least i want to say thank you to all the fans of the show if its wasnt for yall i wouldnt b doing this.

 

 

TrackListing:

Livin' joy - Dreamer (benzi edit)

Future-Gone To The Moon

Dreamer - (benzi edit)

2Chains - Spend

Drake ft Nicki Minaj - Make Me Proud

? - Its love (benzi edit)

2Chains - Riding Through Clouds

Steed Lord - Midnight Affair

Gucci Mane ft. Future - Lost It

Dj Sega - Finito

Lil wayne - She Will

Rick Ross ft Nicki Minaj - You The Boss

Big Sean - Marvin Gay & Chardonnay

Yeah (benzi edit)

Drake ft Nicki Minaj - Make Me Proud

item.title: Lil Wayne - She Will ( #DjMrCarolinaRemix )
item.description:
What up World @DjMrCarolina back with another Wayne remix. This 1 is so chill its unreal if you smoke i suggest that you light up b4 play this. This mix also features a song from The Weekend. The combo of these two songs is epic def one of my favoriets. You can also add this to your sex playlist and if you dont have a sex playliist then you need to start with this song. Still working on Dreams For Sale should b out soon tho and b on the look out for FirstNFlight TV comming soon.

As always follow me on Twitter @DjMrCarolina

 

TrackListing:

Lil Wayne - She Will

The Weekend - What you need

item.title: Dj Mr. Carolina - Late Night Tip Mix
item.description:
I know its been a min since the las mix but ya boy has been busy. Been in the studio with @FirstNFlight working on Dreams For Sale and @FirstNFlight first album both coming soon. This mix is somthing i feel like you would play while your riding around late at night maybe after you get off work or something it just mad chill. As most of you know college life is crazy so idk when i will post the next mix but hopefully soon. As always you  can follow me on twitter @Dj_MrCarolina

Derek Allen - Spirits In The Material World
Big K.R.I.T. - Cruise Control (Feat_Mike_Jarggerr)

Borgore - Someone Elses (Document One Remix)
Big K.R.I.T. - 2 Mph (Feat Dom Kennedy)
Jay-Z  Kanye West - Thats My Bitch
Drake - Ignorant Shit (Feat. Lil Wayne)

item.title: @Dj_MrCarolina - Sunday Morning Mix
item.description:
I know its been a min but im back with a fresh mix for yall ear drums. As most of u know school has started back and im in college so it been crazy lately 2 say the least. This mix right here is a mix of top 40 and random dubstep tracks i found. I just woke up one sunday morning and made this and it came out sounding good....what more can i say. be on the look out for Dreams For Sale coming soon

enjoy

 

 

TrackListing:

Jay Z - Otis

SWEAR - Baby Doll VIP

Wiz Khalifa, Curren$y & Big Sean - O.T.T.R

Derek Allen - Shoulda Listened

Asher Roth - In the Kitchen

Kill Paris - Cosmic Love Affair

Sako - I Get High

Treal Lee & Prince Rick - Throwed Off (Fuck Everybody)

Drake - Im On One

SWEAR - Acknowledgement

What up ppl im gona keep this short I Just want to announce my project before my EP Dreams For Sale which will be LBAF The REMiX. this will be the first single off of the mixtape and it should be out soon. if you still havent heard the mixitape be sure to check it out http://www.datpiff.com/FirstNFlight-Lifestyles-Of-The-Broke-Almost-Famous-mixtape.240258.html

item.title: Drake - I'm On One ( #DjMrCarolinaRemix )
item.description:
What up world how yall doing out there! Im back with another remix for ur listening pleasure. Real quick i want 2 send my thoughts and prayers out to London i know its crazy out there right now but keep ur heads up. Last time i was talking bout working on a new project but didn know what yet well im happy to anounce that im working on a new EP called Dreams For Sale. Hopefully it will be out by the end of this month the 28th (My 21st Bday) 2 be exact so we will see how that goes. This mix is crazy just like all of em but i think yall will like it. Till next time PEACE

O yea and shout out 2 @MurderMark & @ZOMent <<<<<Follow them on twitter & me to @DJ_MrCarolina

Check out my Mixtape: http://www.datpiff.com/FirstNFlight-Lifestyles-Of-The-Broke-Almost-Famous-mixtape.240258.html

 

TrackListing:

Drake - On One (ins)

Murder Mark - Cherry Hill

item.title: Wiz Khalifa - Still Blazin (Dj Mr. Carolina Remix)
item.description:
Ok so Wiz is one of the hottest rapper in the game right now i can say im a fan personally. He's not the most lyrical rapper in the game but his flow is exquisite beats are always on point and his mixtapes are always the shit. From Cabin Fever to Flight School and everything in between. So this mix was a spur of the moment kinda of thing and after i was done i was like this is kinda hot. Not really 2 much to say about it you just have to listen 2 it. Idk what kinda of project im gona work on next im thinking about doing a currency remixmixtape next still debating whatever i put next just know its gona be epic.  Cant say this enough check out my mixtape Lifestyles of The Broke & Almost Famous (LBAF) http://www.datpiff.com/FirstNFlight-Lifestyles-Of-The-Broke-Almost-Famous-mixtape.240258.html. Be sure to leave comments cuz i care what you have to say!!!!

 

TrackListing:

Wiz Khalifa - Still Blazin

TWO DOOR CINEMA CLUB - Something Good Can Work (THE TWELVES remix)
item.dc:creator: DJ Mr.Carolina
item.itunes:summary: Ok so Wiz is one of the hottest rapper in the game right now i can say im a fan personally. He's not the most lyrical rapper in the game but his flow is exquisite beats are always on point and his mixtapes are always the shit. From Cabin Fever to Flight School and everything in between. So this mix was a spur of the moment kinda of thing and after i was done i was like this is kinda hot. Not really 2 much to say about it you just have to listen 2 it. Idk what kinda of project im gona work on next im thinking about doing a currency remixmixtape next still debating whatever i put next just know its gona be epic.  Cant say this enough check out my mixtape Lifestyles of The Broke & Almost Famous (LBAF) http://www.datpiff.com/FirstNFlight-Lifestyles-Of-The-Broke-Almost-Famous-mixtape.240258.html. Be sure to leave comments cuz i care what you have to say!!!!   TrackListing: Wiz Khalifa - Still Blazin TWO DOOR CINEMA CLUB - Something Good Can Work (THE TWELVES remix)

item.title: FirstNFlight - Wavy
item.description:
Hello world @Dj_MrCarolina back with another single from Lifestyles of the Broke & Almost Famous (LBAF) http://www.datpiff.com/FirstNFlight-Lifestyles-Of-The-Broke-Almost-Famous-mixtape.240258.html

This is prob my fave track off the mixtape. The vibe of this song is just so chill u have no choice but 2 sit back and relax. This is the unreleased version of the song so it unedited. Be on the look out for my 1st music video to Come & Go here is a link to the preview http://youtu.be/57VXYeQu9Gs. Be sure to check out The Chronicles Of Roderick:
http://www.datpiff.com/Rod-Ciz-The-Chronicles-Of-Roderick-mixtape.243966.html

item.title: Mr. Carolina - Come & Go
item.description:
If its one thing i have learned in my life its that women are some of the most complex ppl on this planet. They are beautiful and pleasing to the sight but are dangerous to my personal sanity. Idk if i just have bad taste in women or the general population of women in my current location are trifling but eventual i always end up getting F over. When i wrote most of this song i was a lil mad so dont think i dont have respect for women i just have had bad experiences with them in the past.This track is also off of The Chronicles of Roddrick (TCOR) be sure to check it out: http://www.datpiff.com/Rod-Ciz-The-Chronicles-Of-Roderick-mixtape.243966.html

I also have a mixtape out Lifestyles of the Broke & Almost Famous (LBAF): http://www.datpiff.com/FirstNFlight-Lifestyles-Of-The-Broke-Almost-Famous-mixtape.240258.html

You can always get at me on Twitter @Dj_MrCarolina

item.title: Dj Mr. Carolina - 4th of July Mind F&%k
item.description:
Happy 4th every1 Hope everything is well. Tipically i try not 2 put out mixes on holidays but after i made this i fell like the ppl need 2 hear this ASAP. This Mix is a CERTIFIED BANGER!!!!!. I mean i went in on this one. This will def make ur trunk rattle a few ppl might break their necks just from rocking so hard. I should make u pay 4 this 1 but i thought about it and decided against it. The least u can do is tell ur friends about my podcast and FOLLOW ME ON TWITTER @Dj_MrCarolina. Idk if i will be so generous the nx time i make a mix this hot. If ur a fan of the show or electronic music in general u will prob enjoy this mix. be on the Look out for more @FirstNFlight music soon. Be sure to check out my mixtape: Lifestyles of the Broke and Almost Famous (LBAF) http://www.datpiff.com/FirstNFlight-Lifestyles-Of-The-Broke-Almost-Famous-mixtape.240258.html

& Rod Ciz mixtape: The Chronicles of Roderick http://www.datpiff.com/Rod-Ciz-The-Chronicles-Of-Roderick-mixtape.243966.html

New track dropping soon prob Thursday or within the next 2 weeks depending on how things go

Till nx time 

Be EZ

 

TrackListing:

Yc - Racks

Freak Slughter - Bang the Corpse

DJ EXTRODINARE - TWILIGHT ZONE PREVIEw

Borgore - Someone Elses (Document One Remix)

Toadally Krossed Out - Yakity Yak

Fugitive - Crush (Nadastrom Remix)

Dj Fresh - Louder (Feat. Sian Evans) (Flux Pavilion And Doctor P Remix)

Kelis - Milkshake (Baltimore Club Music Remix)

Bounty Killa, Ghetts, Shystie, Trilla, 3.2.1 & English Frank - Limb By Limb

DJ LIL MATIC- SAY YEAH

DJ W3 STINGER - ITS FUNKY HOUSE

Jube ft. Dj Ryhmer- Life of The Party

Kreayshawn - Gucci Gucci (Instrumental)

Nicki Minaj - Pink Friday(Nicki Minaj Theme)

Fat Trel - Respect Wit The Tech (Prod. Lex Luger)

Flux Pavilion - I Can't Stop

item.title: Rod Ciz ft. Mr. Carolina & Packman - What i Always Wanted
item.description: The Chronicles of Rodrick (TCOR) is the sophmore Mixtape from @FirstNFlight recording artist Rod Ciz. TCOR is the follow up project to Who is Rod Ciz and featuring guest apperances from Chad Packman & me Mr. Carolina. TCOR is a interesting and exiting look into the world of Rod Ciz. You can download the Mixtape from the link below http://www.datpiff.com/Rod-Ciz-The-Chronicles-Of-Roderick-mixtape.243966.html

item.description:
I want 2 give a Birthday shout out 2 Rod Ciz AkA @ChroniclesofRod 1/3 of @FirstNFlight HAPPY 21st

In honor of his Bday I give you his Favorite track off of Lifestyles of the Broke & Almost Famous Produced by Chad Packman @dakidchad

Be sure to check out the mixtape

item.title: FirstNFlight - Almost Famous (Prd. Mr. Carolina)
item.description:
Lifestyles of the Broke & Almost Famous IS HERE: http://www.datpiff.com/FirstNFlight-Lifestyles-Of-The-Broke-Almost-Famous-mixtape.240258.html 

So LBAF is out and ready for your ears. Its been a long time in the making but i think it was worth it. S/o 2 >>>>>@ChroniclesofRod @dakidchad & @EddyBNC <<<<<Follow Them!!!!!! Here are a few youtube vids for the mixtape untill we can get some accual vids 2gether:

@FirstNFlight - Phone Numbers http://youtu.be/9h14oXtQCmI 

@FirstNFlight - Paradise http://youtu.be/N5vnWc_479E

 

Direct Download link: http://www.zshare.net/download/91362814af2a1abd/

Enjoy @_DJMRCAROLINA
item.dc:creator: DJ Mr.Carolina

item.title: Dj Mr. Carolina - Old v. New
item.description:
LIFESTYLES OF THE BROKE & ALMOST FAMOUS (LBAF) DROPS JUNE 13th ON DATPIFF.COM & OTHER WEBSITES. Its official June 13th LBAF is going to be released i promise it will be well worth the wait. It for sure will be posted on DatPiff.com im still working on geting it on other websites such as live mixtapes buy mixtape.com and others.

Its been a min since i went in and did a 20+ min mix but i thought it would b apropate for the occation. This mix
featuers songs that i have used befor and some i havent. I try not to use the same tracks over again but i think you will still enjoy it despit that fact.

Enjoy @_DjMrCarolina

 

Tracklisting

Drake - Believe it Or Not

Borgore - Sunsets Ft Diplo (Full)

N.E.R.D - Everyone Nose (Remix) Feat. CRS & Pu

Tempz- Next Hype Instrumental

Borgore - Casablanca (Original Mix)

Wiz Khalifa - Black&Yellow (DJ J Heat)

2Live Crew - tootsie roll

Drake ft Big Sean - Made

kelly Rowland - Motivation

Roscoe Dash - Sexy Girl Anthem

Kanye West - All the lights

Treal Lee & Prince Rick - Throwed Off (Fuck Everybody)

Roscoe Dash ft. Soulja Boy - All the way turnt up (Heroes&Villains RMX)

Chris Brown - Look At Me Now

Wiz Khalifa - Young Khalifa

Deerhunter - Helicopter (Diplo & Lunice mix)

Bad People Riddim(Instrumental)

Kanye West - Heartless (Dubstep Remix)

Wiz khalifa - Gang Bang

Ace Hood - Hustles Hard

Killer Mike-Hello (Produced by Soundtrakk)

item.title: Lil Wayne - If I Die Today (ft. Rick Ross) (@Dj_MrCarolina #Remix)
item.description:
LIFESTYLES OF THE BROKE AND ALMOST FAMOUS IS DONE!!!! I FINISHED REC 2DAY. Bout 2 have it mastered ASAP. Still dont have a release date yet srr but just kno it will be sooner than later. Anyway idk y it took me so long 2 remix this song this 1 gose kinda hard it has a real dance vibe to it. Expect another remix soon im almost finish with it prob within the next week or 2.

Enjoy @_DjMrCarolina

 

Track-Listing:

Bat for Lashes - Daniel (DJ Kue Remix)
Lil Wayne - If I Die Today (ft. Rick Ross)

item.title: DJ Mr. Carolina - 4 Min Work Out
item.description:
What up world!!!!

@DjMr.Carolina back wit another banger. I been busy working on my mixtape wit @FirstNFlight Lifestyles of the Broke & Almost Famous (#LBAF) were almost done with it so it should be droping real soon! Untill then here is a lil min mix i made after hearing DJ Ykcor – The Best Of Baltimore Club Music Vol. 2 check it out Here: http://www.baltimore-club.com/mix/dj-ykcor-%E2%80%93-the-best-of-baltimore-club-music-vol-2.

As always you can send me your music to: Djmrcarolina@gmail.com

Or talk 2 me on Twitter:

@DjMrCarolina

 

Tracklisting

Luke – I Wanna Rock

Travis porter - Make it Rain (dstar uptempo club remix)

Wiz Khalifa - Phonenumbers (Ins)

Cajmere - It's time for the percolator

item.title: The Black Eyed Peas - Dirty Bit vs. Lil B - Hipster Girl (Dj_MrCarolina Remix)
item.description:
Happy 4/20!!!!!!!!!!

What up world hope ur having a great day. Just wanted 2 give yall something 2 listen 2 as u spend some time in the clouds. This mix is kind of a mash-up of 2 completely different worlds but it works out in a strange way. Remember u can always contact me on @DjMrCarolina & Follow my music group @FirstNFlight

TrackListing

The Black Eyed Peas - Dirty Bit

Lil B - Hipster Girl
